page.title: 05Recreation.
page.content: {Maidenhead Rugby Club.}It is situated on the Braywick Road.It costs Â£6.00 per season.The age groups are U8,U9,U10,U11,U12,U13,U14,U15,U16.The club colours are dark purple and black.The Maidenhead tournament is in April.It is on Sundays from 10.45am. to 12.30pm. {Youth Club.}I go to youth club on Wednesday from 6.00pm to 7.30pm.We do basketball,football,cooking,cricket and rounders.At the end we give a lady 30p. and she gives us a beefburger in a roll and chips.Drinks are free.Some weeks we go out to the thicket or a farm or to the leisure centre to go swimming. {Organ Club.} Organ club is on Thursdays and is held from 7:00pm to 8:00pm. It is fortnightly and is held at the Bishops Center. We play on different organs.
